faqs.q: Do I need to make an appointment before visiting?
faqs.a: To minimize waiting time, we recommend booking an appointment via our website or app. However, we still accept walk-in patients.

faqs.q: How much does a medical check-up cost?
faqs.a: General check-up fees start from 300,000 VND. Detailed costs depend on the specialty and any tests (if required).

faqs.q: Does the clinic accept health insurance?
faqs.a: Yes. We support both state health insurance and hospital guarantee for over 20 private insurance providers.
